displayProperties.name: Rekindle the Spark
displayProperties.description:
Open the Armor Details screen and add the maximum amount of Kindling to any piece of Sunlit armor. You can add Kindling under armor mods.

Fully rekindling a piece of Sunlit armor unlocks its glow, and allows you to imbue it with a Spark.

displayProperties.name: A Guardian in Shining Armor

Open the Details screen on a piece of Sunlit armor with Small Kindling added as a mod. Add the Large Kindling under armor mods.

Adding Large Kindling allows Sunlit armor to be imbued with Shining Embers. You may only imbue an armor piece with Large Kindling applied as a mod.

displayProperties.name: Sunlit Hunter Armor
displayProperties.description: A package containing a full set of Sunlit armor for Hunters.

displayProperties.name: EVENT INFO
displayProperties.description:
• Earn Silver Leaves from completing activities throughout the game with Sunlit armor equipped. Wearing a full set of Sunlit armor rewards the most Silver Leaves. Launch into the Bonfire Bash and stoke the bonfire to turn Silver Leaves into Silver Ash. The more you stoke the bonfire, the more Silver Leaves can be transformed into Silver Ash, and the more Solstice armor and weapons are rewarded.

• Silver Ash can be used on Sunlit armor to apply Glowing Embers, then Shining Embers, then Stat Sparks, all of which reroll stats for that armor piece.

• Complete Event Challenges, located on the Quest screen, to acquire Kindling, which can be applied to Sunlit armor. Doing so grants access to better Embers and stat-roll choices from Sparks.

• Glows can be acquired for Sunlit armor by fully rekindling an armor piece by applying Kindling.

• Solstice reward packages, which may contain Masterwork materials, can be purchased from Eva using Silver Ash.

Imbuing with Embers requires the Silver Ash you acquired from the Bonfire Bash. You may only imbue an armor piece with Kindling applied as a mod.
